title: Reminiscences of Yarrow. Edited and annotated by ... Professor Veitch, LL.D. Illustrated by Tom Scott ... Second edition
author: Russell, James
snippet: Mr James Scott of Gilmanscleuch, who was proudof being what is termed a buirdly man, was wont tosay that if others got one bullet through their breast,he would have got two.

title: Reminiscences of Yarrow. Edited and annotated by ... Professor Veitch, LL.D. Illustrated by Tom Scott ... Second edition
author: Russell, James
snippet: Warn Wat o' Harden and his sons,Wi' them will Borthwick Water ride;Warn Gaudilands1 and Allanhaugh,And Gilmanscleuch and Commonside.
